attributes.action: Ensure that ALL School leavers who choose not to work or attend further education,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: be made to carry out unpaid Charity Work until they decide to join real society and contribute. As for "taking a year out"!! Make them spend a year in the Army.
